short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An add-on to allow to mute 🔇and unmute 🔈 with one single key-push.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⬇️ Easy to set up ⬇️:

1. Install and add the extension to Chrome.
2. Click on the extension, and configure your own hotkey
3. Hold that key to talk/unmute 🔈, release to go back to mute.🔇

✨ Features ✨

1. Works in Google Meet and Zoom web client.
2. Strict privacy policy.
3. Choose one hot-key to both mute 🔇 and unmute. 🔈

This extension makes sure that you're unmute only when you intend to in your important meetings.
